text: I understand you can drag and drop custom modules now so if you add `<styles>` to each custom module, do they get floated to the `<head>` section or do they still render in the exact order the module appears in?

<@U018SKF3M9U> Wait so... Does this mean that it's now possible to create custom coded HTML templates for the new drag and drop editor? Thought this was still on the roadmap, as mentioned by Jon earlier in February? :slightly_smiling_face: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CES6JU0RY/p1612365373030600?thread_ts=1611702671.017500&cid=CES6JU0RY>
This is definitely still on the roadmap, and unfortunately the editor can't support them yet but hopefully will this year! The rendering for now does work and templates can be built

Oooh that's exciting news, Sarah! The editor experience aside, is the rendering in a state where you'd say it's stable enough to be used for live projects? Or could there still be breaking changes to that specifically?
